Name: Run Entity Framework migrations (Update-Database)
Description: Runs `Update-Database` to update the database to the latest Entity Framework migrations
Author: foresightyj

Parameters.Name: EfToolsFolder
Parameters.Label: Path to EF Tools folder
Parameters.HelpText: Please provide a full path to a folder where Migrate.exe (along with other EF files are contained, available from EF nuget package) on tentacle

Parameters.Name: NugetPackageStepName
Parameters.Label: Site Path
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the previously-deployed package step that contains the files with web.config and `/bin` folder

Parameters.Name: AssemblyDllName
Parameters.Label: Name of Assembly file with EF-Context
Parameters.HelpText: Please provide a name of the assembly file where EF-context is stored

Parameters.Name: ConnectionStringName
Parameters.Label: ConnectionStringName
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the key in <connectionStrings> section in Web.Config
